Lyric:
[00:20.480]Hear the sound of the falling rain
[00:23.900]Coming down like an Armageddon flame （Hey!）
[00:27.100]The shame
[00:28.000]The ones who died without a name
[00:33.347]Hear the dogs howling out of key
[00:36.717]To a hymn called Faith and Misery（Hey!）
[00:40.477]And bleed, the company lost the war today
[00:47.690]I beg to dream and differ from the hollow lies
[00:53.227]This is the dawning of the rest of our lives
[01:00.177]On holiday
[01:02.108]
[01:08.337]Hear the drum pounding out of time
[01:11.578]Another protester has crossed the line （Hey!）
[01:15.238]To find, the money's on the other side
[01:21.447]Can I get another Amen? （Amen!）
[01:24.658]There's a flag wrapped around a score of men （Hey!）
[01:28.548]A gag, a plastic bag on a monument
[01:34.527]I beg to dream and differ from the hollow lies
[01:41.989]This is the dawning of the rest of our lives
[01:49.080]On holiday
[02:27.300]The representative from California has the floor;
[02:31.700]Sieg Heil to the president Gasman
[02:35.900]Bombs away is your punishment
[02:38.390]Pulverize the Eiffel towers
[02:42.240]Who criticize your government
[02:45.920]Bang bang goes the broken glass and
[02:49.210]Kill all the fags that don't agree
[02:52.400]Trials by fire, setting fire
[02:55.379]Is not a way that's meant for me
[02:58.270]Just cause, just cause, because we're outlaws yeah!
[03:05.570]I beg to dream and differ from the hollow lies
[03:12.600]This is the dawning of the rest of our lives
[03:18.660]I beg to dream and differ from the hollow lies
[03:25.210]This is the dawning of the rest of our lives
[03:32.400]
[03:34.700]This is our lives on holiday
